name: ghost buster
description: Akins, a resident of the city Vincent is on his way back to his old mansion located near bridgetown forest  . During  Vincent teenage his parent bought this  mansion from an old lady .They used to spend their summer vacations there every year ,far away from the populated city .But after the death of his parents he breaks off visiting the mystery and magical affairs at the embassy is headed towards the mansion after many years .things get creepy on his ack to the mansion and he is determined to reach the mansion
